std_db = 'odw_standardised_db'
hrm_db = 'odw_harmonised_db'
std_table = 'nsip_s51_advice'
hrm_table = 'casework_nsip_advice_dim_temp'

hrm_pk = 'NSIPAdviceID'
hrm_pk_original = 'AdviceNodeID'

mapping = {
    'AdviceNodeID': 'caseid',
    'AdviceTitle': 'title',
    'CaseReference': 'casereference',
    'AdviceReference': 'advicereference',
    'AdviceStatus': 'status',
    'Section51Advice': 'Yes',
    'Enquirer': 'from',
    'EnquirerOrganisation': 'agent',
    'EnquiryDate': 'enquirydate',
    'EnquiryMethod': 'method',
    'Enquiry': 'enquirydetails',
    'AdviceFrom': 'advicegivenby',
    'AdviceDate': 'advicedate',
    'Advice': 'advicedetails',
    'AdviceLastModified': None,
    'AttachmentCount': None,
    'AttachmentID': 'attachmentids',
    'AttachmentLastModified': None,
    'LastPublishedDate': None,
    'CaseNodeID': 'adviceid',
    'WelshLanguage': None,
    'CaseWorkType': None,
    'IngestionDate': 'expected_from'

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from notebookutils import mssparkutils
import json
import calendar
from datetime import datetime, timedelta, date
import pandas as pd
import os

spark = SparkSession.builder.getOrCreate()

storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')
raw_container = "abfss://odw-raw@" + storage_account
## Get the latest ingested data in Standardised

# order by message_datetime ascending the below query
latest_ingestion = spark.sql(f"SELECT * FROM {std_db}.{std_table} WHERE expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM {std_db}.{std_table})")

# remove the column ingested_datetime and then removing duplicates
latest_ingestion = latest_ingestion.toPandas()
latest_ingestion = latest_ingestion.drop(columns=['ingested_datetime']).drop_duplicates()

create_df = latest_ingestion[latest_ingestion['message_type'] == 'Created']
update_df = latest_ingestion[latest_ingestion['message_type'] == 'Updated']
delete_df = latest_ingestion[latest_ingestion['message_type'] == 'Deleted']

import hashlib

def calculate_md5(row):
    row_str = ''.join(map(str, row))
    md5_hash = hashlib.md5(row_str.encode()).hexdigest()
    return md5_hash

def apply_mapping(df):
    target_df = pd.DataFrame()
    for target_col, source_col in mapping.items():
        if source_col in df.columns:
            if 'Date' in target_col:
                target_df[target_col] = pd.to_datetime(df[source_col])
            else:
                target_df[target_col] = df[source_col]
        else:
            target_df[target_col] = source_col

    target_df['RowID'] = target_df.apply(calculate_md5, axis=1)

    source_system_df = spark.sql("SELECT * FROM odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact WHERE Description = 'Casework' AND IsActive = 'Y'")
    target_df['SourceSystemID'] = source_system_df.toPandas().at[0, 'SourceSystemID']

    target_df['Migrated'] = '1'
    target_df['ODTSourceSystem'] = 'ODT'
    target_df['ValidTo'] = None
    target_df['IsActive'] = 'Y'
    target_df[hrm_pk] = ''

    return target_df

# convert the dataframe into harmonised schema
target_df = apply_mapping(create_df)

# appending Primary Key incremental value
pk_df = spark.sql(f"SELECT Max({hrm_pk}) AS {hrm_pk} FROM {hrm_db}.{hrm_table}")
max_id = int(pk_df.toPandas().at[0, hrm_pk])
incremental_ids = range(max_id + 1, max_id + 1 + len(target_df))
target_df[hrm_pk] = pd.Series(incremental_ids)
target_df[hrm_pk] = target_df[hrm_pk].astype(str)

df_to_append = spark.createDataFrame(target_df)
df_to_append.write.format("delta").mode("append").saveAsTable(f"{hrm_db}.{hrm_table}")

source_df = apply_mapping(delete_df)

comma_separated_ids = ','.join([f"'{str(value)}'" for value in source_df[hrm_pk_original]])

current_timestamp = datetime.now()

spark.sql(f"""
    UPDATE {hrm_db}.{hrm_table}
    SET IsActive = 'N', ValidTo = '{current_timestamp}'
    WHERE {hrm_pk_original} IN ({comma_separated_ids})

spark.sql('Drop table odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim_temp')
df = spark.sql(f"SELECT * FROM {hrm_db}.casework_nsip_advice_dim WHERE IsActive = 'Y' LIMIT 6")
df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").saveAsTable(f"{hrm_db}.{hrm_table}")

%%sql
-- Build casework_nsip_advice_dim_new table
-- Gets modified or deleted from source rows


-- gets data that matches of SourceID and flags that it is modified based on a row (md5) hash. Flags as "NewData"
-- gets data that is in the target but not in source. Flags as "DeletedData"

SELECT DISTINCT
    CASE
        WHEN T1.caseId IS NULL
        THEN T3.NSIPAdviceID
        ELSE NULL
    END                             AS NSIPAdviceID,
    T1.caseId                       AS AdviceNodeID,
    T1.title                        AS AdviceTitle,
    T1.caseReference                AS CaseReference,
    T1.adviceReference              AS AdviceReference,
    T1.status                       AS AdviceStatus,
    "Yes"                           AS Section51Advice,
    T1.from                         AS Enquirer,
    T1.agent                        AS EnquirerOrganisation,
    T1.enquiryDate                  AS EnquiryDate,
    T1.method                       AS EnquiryMethod,
    T1.enquiryDetails               AS Enquiry,
    T1.adviceGivenBy                AS AdviceFrom,
    T1.adviceDate                   AS AdviceDate,
    T1.adviceDetails                AS Advice,
    NULL                            AS AdviceLastModified,
    NULL                            AS AttachmentCount,
    T1.attachmentids                AS AttachmentID,
    NULL                            AS AttachmentLastModified,
    NULL                            AS LastPublishedDate,
    T1.adviceId                     AS CaseNodeID, -- NEED TO BE CHECKED
    NULL                            AS WelshLanguage,
    NULL                            AS CaseWorkType,
    "1"                             AS Migrated,
    "ODT"                           AS ODTSourceSystem,
    T2.SourceSystemID               AS SourceSystemID,
    to_timestamp(T1.expected_from)  AS IngestionDate,
    NULL                            AS ValidTo,
    md5(concat(IFNULL(T1.caseId,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.title,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.caseReference,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.adviceReference,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.status,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.from,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.agent,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.enquiryDate,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.method,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.enquiryDetails,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.adviceGivenBy,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.adviceDate,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.adviceDetails,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.attachmentids,'.'),
                    IFNULL(T1.adviceId,'.'))
        )                           AS RowID, -- this hash should contain all the defining fields
    'Y'                             AS IsActive,
    T3.IsActive                     AS HistoricIsActive

FROM odw_standardised_db.nsip_s51_advice T1

LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.main_sourcesystem_fact T2   
    ON "Casework" = T2.Description      
        AND T2.IsActive = 'Y'

FULL JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_advice_dim T3 
    ON T1.caseId = T3.AdviceNodeID AND 
        IFNULL(T1.attachmentids,'None') = T3.AttachmentID
        AND T3.IsActive = 'Y'

            Where T1.caseId IS NOT NULL
            AND T1.expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM odw_standardised_db.nsip_s51_advice)

-- WHERE
--         -- flags new data        
--         (   CASE
--                 WHEN T1.caseId = T3.AdviceNodeID AND IFNULL(T1.attachmentids,'None') = T3.AttachmentID
--                 AND  
--                 md5(concat(
--                     IFNULL(T1.caseId,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.title,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.caseReference,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.adviceReference,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.status,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.from,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.agent,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.enquiryDate,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.method,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.enquiryDetails,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.adviceGivenBy,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.adviceDate,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.adviceDetails,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.attachmentids,'.'),
--                     IFNULL(T1.adviceId,'.')))
--                 <> T3.RowID  -- same row, changed data
--                 THEN 'Y'
--                 WHEN T3.AdviceNodeID IS NULL -- new AdviceNodeID
--                 THEN 'Y'
--             ELSE 'N'
--             END  = 'Y' ) 
--     AND T1.caseId IS NOT NULL
